attributes.action: stop using tax payers money to fund the methadone programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The money used is exceeding billions and is predominantly funded using tax payer's money. it seems unfair when other drugs such as cancer and age related illness therapies are treated with a postcode lottery and for some have to be funded by themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
